entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
